properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) LISTCOUNT FROM REPORT WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT CON_NO , CON_TYPE , CON_TITLE , M.MEM_ID , CON_DATE FROM CONTACT C JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.USER_NO = C.USER_NO) WHERE C.STATUS='Y' ORDER BY CON_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
INSERT /*com.kh.admin.contact.model.dao.ContactDao#insertContact()*/ INTO CONTACT ( CON_NO , CON_TITLE , CON_TYPE , CON_CONTENT , USER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_CNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? )
